name: Fella Health
headline: The telehealth clinic for men with obesity
description: Fella Health is the telehealth clinic for men with obesity. With Fella, patients meet a board-certified obesity doctor to prescribe FDA-approved medications, while they undertake personalized health coaching through our app.

founders.name: Richie Cartwright, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Fella Health, the telemedicine clinic for men with obesity. Serving 1 million fellas by 2026.
Inspired by my own 6-year secret battle with binge eating disorder.

Before Fella, I founded an AI company (FlowX) working with the UK government. FlowX applied a layer of computer vision to existing CCTV cameras to extract transport data, to help ease congestion. FlowX was acquired after we won a $650k contract with the UK Department for Transport.

## FAQ
### will it work?
By pairing our medication with your dedication, Fella members experience 2-4x better results than diet and exercise alone.
### Is this safe?
Absolutely. Your health is too important to take risks. Our board-certified clinicians specializing in men's health will thoroughly evaluate your medical history to ensure the medications we prescribe are safe, effective, and right for your needs. We take every precaution, make adjustments when necessary, and provide ongoing medical supervision. You can feel confident you're in good hands with our clinical experts guiding your weight loss journey.Check out all of our plans and pricing [here](https://www.fellahealth.com/</treatments>).
### Is medication cost included?
Yes (for all fellas on our Semaglutide, Tirzepatide, or Enclomiphene treatments)!
### How much does this cost?
We know that as a busy man, your time and budget can be limited. That’s why our core program starts at less than $10 per day for everything you need to lose weight: GLP-1 medications, health assessments, and medical support. The cost won't change based on the specific dose you require.‍Check out all of our plans and pricing [here](https://www.fellahealth.com/</treatments>).
### WHICH medications will I be prescribed?
Our medical team will evaluate your health history and recommend the most effective GLP-1 medication and dosage specifically for you. With your busy lifestyle, we know you want rapid yet sustainable results. That's why we prescribe only clinically-proven GLP-1 weight loss medications shown to help men like you lose weight and keep it off long-term. You can feel confident our personalized medication plan will be tailored to help you achieve your weight loss goals quickly and safely.Check out all of our plans and pricing [here.](https://www.fellahealth.com/</treatments>)
### How long does it take?
As a busy man, we know your time is limited. While the journey is personal, our program is designed to deliver rapid results while establishing healthy habits for the long-term.Within the first month, you'll notice our proven medications curbing hunger and reducing cravings. By months 2-3, you’ll have built better habits into your routine. From months 4-6, maintaining your new lifestyle becomes second nature.After 6 months, members like you have lost an average of 10% of their body weight and kept it off. And in just 12 months, you'll have achieved sustainable weight loss and made lasting improvements to energy and confidence - all while still excelling in your demanding career.This is not a quick fix - it's a science-backed approach tailored for busy men to help you lose weight and live the healthy, active lifestyle you want for good.Check out all of our plans and pricing [here.](https://www.fellahealth.com/</treatments>)
### HOW DOES THE METABOLIC ASSESSMENT WORK?
As a busy man, we understand the limited time you have for medical visits. **That's why we offer free lab work** , either locally at a clinic or through our convenient at-home lab test kits, to assess your current health. We'll review the results together to fully understand your unique biology and needs, allowing us to create a personalized medication plan tailored to help you lose weight rapidly and sustainably.Throughout your journey, our obesity experts are available to answer all your questions, ensure medications are safe and effective, and provide ongoing support. At Fella, we believe in convenient and straightforward care so you can focus on work, family, and achieving your goals.

As a busy man, we know you have limited time for complex weight loss programs. Our approach is designed specifically to fit your lifestyle. Testosteronerejuvenation
## WHAT IS Testosterone Rejuvenation?
As men age, their body's natural production of testosterone depletes, this is even more severe for men with obesity. This medication is enclomiphene, taken orally. It will help boost your body’s natural production of testosterone, helping to increase lean muscle mass, improve your energy, mood and productivity and enhance sexual performance.
CLOSE
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62aebd5e1a672b9ce6b506c4/649d16ddba75cbd927ec4e31_Vial%202.avif)
GLP-1
## HOW DO GLP-1S WORK?
GLP-1 medications act like the body’s natural hormone GLP-1. They help control your hunger by slowing down the emptying of your stomach so that you feel fuller for longer.
CLOSE
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62aebd5e1a672b9ce6b506c4/64d872674aeea129d40f6e6a_box-t.avif)
tirzepatide
## WHAT IS Tirzepatide?
Once-weekly injection which activates both the GLP-1 and GIP receptors. Highly effective for blood glucose control and weight loss. On average, patients on this treatment drop 22.5% of their bodyweight.

Semaglutide
## WHAT IS SEMAGLUTIDE?
Semaglutide is a long-lasting GLP-1 medication that is taken once weekly as an injection. On average, patients on this treatment drop 16.9% of their bodyweight.

## FAQ
### will it work?
By pairing our medication with your dedication, Fella members experience 2-4x better results than diet and exercise alone.
### Is this safe?
Absolutely. Your health is too important to take risks. Our medical team will evaluate your health history and recommend the most effective GLP-1 medication and dosage specifically for you. With your busy lifestyle, we know you want rapid yet sustainable results. That's why we prescribe only clinically-proven GLP-1 weight loss medications shown to help men like you lose weight and keep it off long-term. You can feel confident our personalized medication plan will be tailored to help you achieve your weight loss goals quickly and safely.Check out all of our plans and pricing here.⟨7⟩
### How long does it take?
As a busy man, we know your time is limited. ## WHAT IS Testosterone Rejuvenation?
As men age, their body's natural production of testosterone depletes, this is even more severe for men with obesity. This medication is enclomiphene, taken orally. It will help boost your body’s natural production of testosterone, helping to increase lean muscle mass, improve your energy, mood and productivity and enhance sexual performance.

## HOW DO GLP-1S WORK?
GLP-1 medications act like the body’s natural hormone GLP-1. They help control your hunger by slowing down the emptying of your stomach so that you feel fuller for longer.

**Fella Health: Revolutionizing Men's Health Through Telemedicine**

Founded in 2021 and located in the tech hub of San Francisco, Fella Health is a telehealth clinic aiming to make waves in the realm of men’s obesity management. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch W20, they've adopted an approach that combines advanced medical treatments with personalized health coaching delivered via their app.

**Mission at Heart**
Fella's mission is straightforward: to be the go-to telehealth clinic for men battling obesity. They make it easy for patients to connect with board-certified obesity doctors who prescribe FDA-approved medications. Pair that with their easy-to-use app for health coaching, and you’ve got a comprehensive weight management solution.

**The Team and Treating Patients**
Fella Health runs with a lean team of just four employees, all committed to helping men achieve their weight loss goals. They focus on evidence-based treatments like GLP-1 medications, such as Semaglutide and Tirzepatide, known to aid significant weight loss—averaging 16.9% and 22.5% respectively of total body weight.

**Personalized Approach**
At Fella, it's not just about medications. Every patient undergoes a metabolic assessment, and they receive free coaching tailored to their unique lifestyle and challenges. The program includes regular check-ins with a health coach and access to ongoing support—an essential element for maintaining weight loss long-term.

**Risk-Free Health Exploration**
Worried about committing? Fella offers a six-month money-back guarantee, which underscores their confidence in the effectiveness of their program. If you dedicate yourself to the plan and don’t achieve your target within that period, you get your money back—no strings attached.

**Next Steps and Accessibility**
Fella Health has simplified the onboarding process. Interested individuals can fill out a quick quiz to get started. From weight loss medications to testosterone rejuvenation treatments, they cater to various aspects of men's health.

For more information or to join Fella Health in their mission to redefine men’s health, visit their website at [Fella Health](https://www.fellahealth.com/).

---

In summary, Fella Health is where science meets lifestyle changes. It's practical, straightforward, and offers the kind of personalized touch that busy men need. If you're looking for a way to tackle obesity without the hassle of traditional clinics, this is definitely a place to explore.
